site.title: KUINI - Pure Manuka. Pure New Zealand.
site.description: Discover KUINI's premium New Zealand Manuka Honey. Sustainably sourced, authentically pure, naturally powerful.
site.author: KUINI Honey Co.
site.keywords: manuka honey, new zealand, organic, premium, sustainable, wellness, natural

brand.name: KUINI
brand.tagline: Pure Manuka. Pure New Zealand. Discover KUINI.
brand.mission: Delivering premium New Zealand Manuka Honey with a commitment to nature, purity, wellness, and authenticity through sustainable beekeeping practices.

hero.headline: Pure Manuka. Pure New Zealand. Discover KUINI.
hero.subheadline: Experience the extraordinary healing power of authentic New Zealand Manuka Honey, crafted by nature and perfected by our artisan beekeepers.

products.name: KUINI Reserve UMF 25+
products.description: Our ultra-premium grade Manuka honey with exceptional therapeutic properties
products.tasting_notes: Intense, complex flavor with profound earthy undertones and a luxurious, silky finish
products.best_for: Therapeutic use, wound healing, serious wellness support

products.name: KUINI Platinum UMF 20+
products.description: Premium grade Manuka honey with exceptional antibacterial properties
products.tasting_notes: Rich, complex flavor with earthy undertones and a smooth, velvety finish
products.best_for: Advanced wellness, immune support, daily therapeutic use

products.name: KUINI Classic UMF 15+
products.description: Perfect balance of potency and everyday enjoyment
products.tasting_notes: Warm caramel notes with subtle floral hints and gentle sweetness
products.best_for: Regular wellness routine, immune support, gourmet use

products.name: KUINI Daily UMF 10+
products.description: Ideal for daily wellness and culinary applications
products.tasting_notes: Light amber with delicate floral aroma and mild, sweet taste
products.best_for: Daily consumption, tea sweetener, cooking, baking

products.name: KUINI Pure UMF 5+
products.description: Entry-level premium Manuka honey for new enthusiasts
products.tasting_notes: Smooth texture with subtle camphor notes and natural sweetness
products.best_for: Cooking, baking, breakfast, introduction to Manuka

products.name: KUINI Wildflower Blend
products.description: Artisan blend of Manuka with native New Zealand wildflowers
products.tasting_notes: Floral bouquet with hints of clover, pohutukawa, and native bush honey
products.best_for: Gourmet experiences, gifts, unique flavors, cheese pairings

beekeeper.title: Meet Our Master Beekeeper
beekeeper.name: James McKenzie
beekeeper.experience: 25 years of dedicated beekeeping in New Zealand
beekeeper.quote: Every hive has its own personality. My role is to listen to the bees and provide them with the environment they need to create nature's most precious gift.
beekeeper.background: James grew up on a family farm in the South Island and has been working with bees since he was a teenager.

contact.title: Connect with KUINI
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
